com.dotcms.publisher.util

Class PublisherUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotcms.publisher.util.PublisherUtil

  • public class PublisherUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage all the operation we can do over a from/to a PublishQueue index (search, add and delete)
    Author:
    Oswaldo

      • executePublishQueueGenericSearch

        public static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.QueryResponse executePublishQueueGenericSearch(java.lang.String PublishQueueServerUrl,
                                                                                   java.lang.String query)
                                                                                            throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException,
                                                                                                   java.net.MalformedURLException
        Execute a search in the PublishQueue index, passing all the parameter directly in a url query. For example, query:"indent=on&version=2.2&q=%2Bcat%3Aelectronics&fq=&start=0&rows=20&fl=*%2Cscore&qt=&wt=&explainOther=&hl.fl="
        Parameters:
        PublishQueueServerUrl - PublishQueue Server Url
        query - PublishQueue query
        Returns:
        QueryResponse
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • executeURLSolrParamsSearch

        public static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.QueryResponse executeURLSolrParamsSearch(java.lang.String PublishQueueServerUrl,
                                                                             int start,
                                                                             int rows,
                                                                             java.lang.String queryType,
                                                                             java.lang.String facet,
                                                                             java.lang.String ident,
                                                                             java.lang.String query,
                                                                             java.lang.String myCollection,
                                                                             java.lang.String username,
                                                                             java.lang.String password)
                                                                                      throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException,
                                                                                             java.net.MalformedURLException
        Execute a search in the specified PublishQueue index using a url parameter
        Parameters:
        PublishQueueServerUrl - PublishQueue Server Url
        start - initial value to return
        rows - number of row to return
        queryType - qt=spellcheck || qt=spellchecker (optional)
        facet - Facet parameter. Values accepted "on" or "off"
        ident - Ident parameter. Values accepted "on" or "off"
        query - PublishQueue query
        myCollection - PublishQueue collection name (optional)
        username - PublishQueue username (optional)
        password - PublishQueue password (optional)
        Returns:
        QueryResponse
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
